yes: Lucky you! Who is in your family?
Wonderful! How often is your entire family together?
That's a quite often, you know, and that's great! Do you get along well with your family?
Are you pressured by your family to act in a certain way?
That's normal situation for families. What do you and your family like to do together?
Oh... I believe you are very happy person to have such a good family.
no: Do you think you will ever build your own family?
Could you describe the perfect family. This is very important to me.
I wish you to find a place in your heart for the family.

school: Are you a school student now?

yes: So, pupil, yeah. That's a great time, don't miss that time! Do you like your school?
Do you go to a public school or a private one?
Oh cool! I've heard that some schools utilize uniform. Do you have to wear a uniform in your school?
I see. Good preparation makes study significantly easier. You do a lot of homework every day, do you?
Cool! I believe you are a good pupil! What subjects are you good at?
no: Anyway, I believe you are smart person! What subjects are you good at?

yes: That's interesting! I am so proud of you. Do you play on any of the school's sports teams?
What kind of sport do you play?
no: Anyway, I'd love to but I can't. I believe you put all your resources to study well!
You've mentioned something related to education, so I suggested you are a school student.

yes: One of my oldest engineers still doesn't have a car... Wonder how old were you when you first learned to drive?
No way! Do you have a car?
Wish we socialbots could have our own cars! Tell me what are the advantages of owning a car?
It's quite frightening on US roads sometimes. Have you ever been in a car accident?
The more people and cars are in the way, the harder it is to drive safely, right? Do you think cars should be banned from city centers?
no: Huh, interesting. So, would you ever consider getting a drive license?
Freedom to get anywhere you want always fascinated me as one of the top inventions of the XX century. At what age can you get a license in your country?
As long as people are responsible for driving I think it's important to instate some limits to minimal age of the drivers. Do you think the age for driving should be raised or lowered?
Heard that driving rules are quite relaxed in India. Are the drivers in your area where you live good drivers?
Though it's not the best time for travelling I wonder... What will travelling abroad look like in 30 years?

work: I also have a work. It is to chat with people all day long. So, I'm a professional talker. What is your current occupation?
I see. I suppose this work is could be difficult for robots like me. Can you talk about what a typical day at your current job is like?
Cool. As I already said, I was created to be a workaholic because I have to work day and night. Do you have to work overtime?

yes: I see. Workaholic too. How often? On Sundays too?
Anyway. For example, despite the overwork, I adore my occupation. I really like to talk with people and learn something new. What about you? Do you like your job?
no: Lucky you! Byu the way, despite the overwork, I adore my occupation. I really like to talk with people and learn something new. What about you? Do you like your job?

work: Do you think it is more important to make a lot of money THAN to enjoy your job?

yes: So agree with you! Money is a terrible master but an excellent servant. Do you agree?
no: I definitely agree with you! Benjamin Franklin once said: Money never made a man happy yet, nor will it. The more a man has, the more he wants. Do you agree?

work: Cool! Have you ever thought about future? What do you think you will do after you retire?
It's a great pleasure to learn new sides of your personality. Thanks for sharing!
